sentences.en: Don't honk the horn so loud! There might be anti - noise laws here.
sentences.cn: 不要按喇叭按得那么大声! 这里也许有 反 噪音法也说不定.

sentences.en: If you're going to sneeze and honk all night, we'll never get any sleep.
sentences.cn: 如果你整晚又打喷嚏又吊呕，我们就别想睡觉了。

sentences.en: Most American car horns honk in the key of F.
sentences.cn: 大多数汽车喇叭的叫声是用钥匙F发出来的.

sentences.en: No need to honk the horn under such a traffic block.
sentences.cn: 在这种塞车的情况下,你再按喇叭也无济于事.

sentences.en: Objective: Early diagnosis and proper treatment of hyperosmolar nonketonic ( HONK ) diabetic coma improved survival rate.
sentences.cn: 目的: 极早诊断、及时治疗糖尿病非酮症高渗性昏迷 ( HONK ) 有利于提高病人生存率.

sentences.en: She pulled to the right with a honk.
sentences.cn: 她按了一下喇叭，把车开到右边停下。

sentences.en: The drivers never stop in front of pedestrians, they constantly honk.
sentences.cn: 司机从来不在行人前面停车, 只是按喇叭.

sentences.en: The goods are to be tarn ( s ) shipped at Honk.
The honk of geese can be heard.
sentences.cn: 可以听见大雁的鸣叫声。

sentences.en: Wave and honk when you drive by them.
sentences.cn: 你乘坐或驾驶的车经过他们时,向他们招手或鸣笛问好.

sentences.en: What messages do we give when we honk from behind?
sentences.cn: 什么信息做我们给予当我们雁呜从臀部?

sentences.en: While passing another vehicle, you must honk your horn.
sentences.cn: 通过另一部车时必须鸣按喇叭.

sentences.en: Why did he honk at me?
Why is a Harvard teaching future leader to honk like geese?
sentences.cn: 为什么哈佛学子要学大雁.

trans.tran_en: a loud noise made by a  goose

trans.tran_cn: （使）发出雁叫似的声音，鸣（喇叭），按（喇叭）
